title: How the fuck is Sett getting nerf before any Adc?
body: Cause fuck did you jump the gun to nerf Sett while Kai'sa is untouched. Jinx is untouched. Ashe is untouched. Jhin is untouched. Ryze is untouched. Like Ryze is a level of broken that needs a fucking hot fix, but here you are giving a melee champion another fucking nerf. Cause it's not bad enough Ryze gets a free {{item:3044}}  to make up for his weaknesses, but his damage is bullshit on top of bullshit. Like Undo the fucking Sett nerf.

replies.body: Because Sett is wildly overpowered with the highest win rate in the game and the highest pick rate top lane and no amount of whining or apologetic bullshit toward him will change that.

> [{quoted}](name=NemeBro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2020-01-29T20:37:26.795+0000)
>
> Because Sett is wildly overpowered with the highest win rate in the game and the highest pick rate top lane and no amount of whining or apologetic bullshit toward him will change that.

That is the dumbest shit I have read in ages. 1. He doesn't have the highest win rate, Riot even said it was inflated by a bug. 2. Of course he has the highest pick rate, he is a new juggernaut and we haven't had one in ages. Pick rate doesn't mean he is broken. 3. Top lane has been infested with adc for ages and he can at least semi deal with them, who isn't going to want that?

His winrate was inflated by a bug, but as Riot has pointed out, he actually is still too high after fixing this bug. And there are quite some websites which claim that he is the number 1 champion currently.

Which honestly is no wonder if you look at his kit.
Like you said, he can semi deal with ADCs. Because his ultimate grants him access to the enemy backline while also weaponizing the enemy frontline for it (dealing more damage to all enemies the more health the primary target has).

A juggernaut with his utility (gigantic shield, stun that is able to hit an entire team, backline access with huge slow), he shouldn't have the damage he currently has.
Especially since he also has great synergy with runes like shield bash, since his shield is absolutely ridiculously huge if he gets his grit high enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Chembaron Yamada,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2020-01-29T22:07:15.062+0000)
>
> His winrate was inflated by a bug, but as Riot has pointed out, he actually is still tohigh after fixing this bug. And there are quite some websites which claim that he is the number 1 champion currently.

It really isn't too high. He isn't Yasuo level mechanical and should have a higher win rate. Also his kit countering a lot of champions doesn't mean he is broken, just that he counters a lot of people. Garen building a crit/as build in his new meta leaves him to be destroyed. Darius can't get free kills on Sett because Sett's W counters his bleed. A champion meant to be in the middle of the fight will always have a high winrate or be unusable. It is a damage Meta, either you can fight through it or you get instantly popped which is what is about to happen with this W nerf.

> Which honestly is no wonder if you look at his kit.
> Like you said, he can semi deal with ADCs. Because his ultimate grants him access to the enemy backline while also weaponizing the enemy frontline for it (dealing more damage to all enemies the more health the primary target has).

Which he can only do with his W as is. If he blasts W once per fight, he is just going to lose. 

> A juggernaut with his utility (gigantic shield, stun that is able to hit an entire team, backline access with huge slow), he shouldn't have the damage he currently has.
> Especially since he also has great synergy with runes like shield bash, since his shield is absolutely ridiculously huge if he gets his grit high enough.

He is a juggernaut, he of course should have high damage. Him having backline access doesn't mean much if he is going to be kitted and die the second he gets in there. I have tried every build I could on Sett on pbe and live and he isn't darius, him building tanky doesn't do shit for him like it does for Darius.

> [{quoted}](name=Bultz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2020-01-29T20:53:28.971+0000)
>
> That is the dumbest shit I have read in ages. 

Do you not read your own posts?

> [{quoted}](name=NemeBro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2020-01-30T00:55:57.924+0000)
>
> Do you not read your own posts?

Yeah and your's was still dumber.

Didn't we all just read a week ago that Sett was perfectly balanced and not OP at all, now he's OP and being nerfed? 

Roit Pls!

Because Sett is completely broken with a winrate through the roof, far beyond any ADC.

Yes, there was a bug. No, it did not inflate his winrate, we have before and after numbers. Champ is just broken.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2020-01-29T21:14:47.925+0000)
>
> Because Sett is completely broken with a winrate through the roof, far beyond any ADC.
> 
> Yes, there was a bug. No, it did not inflate his winrate, we have before and after numbers. Champ is just broken.

His win rate isn't through the roof and was inflated by a bug. Yes it inflated win rate.

54-55% after the fix is busted as hell, typically people start yelling for nerfs at 52%+

Looks like you just spam sett, explains why you are in denial about this. Going to have to find a new freelo champ.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2020-01-30T22:03:02.698+0000)
>
> 54-55% after the fix is busted as hell, typically people start yelling for nerfs at 52%+
> 
> Looks like you just spam sett, explains why you are in denial about this. Going to have to find a new freelo champ.

I don't play ranked except with friends, so that freelo shit is stupid. As for his win rate, You are telling me a champion designed to do well in the center of fights is doing well in the center of fights? Holy shit bruh, you're the smartest person in the world. It's almost like a ranged champion using range. You so smart.

> As for his win rate, You are telling me a champion designed to do well in the center of fights is doing well in the center of fights?

No, i am not telling you that, and i cant even imagine where you got that. Unless you think the entire game is "The center of a fight", which says more about your ELO than anything else.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-31T02:43:23.702+0000)
>
> No, i am not telling you that, and i cant even imagine where you got that. Unless you think the entire game is "The center of a fight", which says more about your ELO than anything else.

Bruh the entire game is just fighting? Duh fuq? What you making tea in lane?
Wood AF.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=0006000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-01T00:40:42.775+0000)
>
> Wood AF.

Lol congrats on being in wood

Because even when top has more than double the champ pool of botlane, Sett still almost has the same pickrates as the highest pickrate adc.
While holding such absurd pickrate, he also holds an absurd winrate of 56-55%~ winrate on his 2nd patch, higher than any other champion in the game.

Also, watching your match history is hilarious and puts a lot of context into this thread.

> [{quoted}](name=JackMcCarry,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-01-29T20:39:10.746+0000)
>
> Because even when top has more than double the champ pool of botlane, Sett still almost has the same pickrates as the highest pickrate adc.
> While holding such absurd pickrate, he also holds an absurd winrate of 56-55%~ winrate on his 2nd patch, higher than any other champion in the game.
> 
> Also, watching your match history is hilarious and puts a lot of context into this thread.

Pick rate doesn't make him need nerfs, that is just stupid. 

As I said to some one else,

1. Of course he has the highest pick rate, he is a new juggernaut and we haven't had one in ages. Pick rate doesn't mean he is broken.

2. Top lane has been infested with adc for ages and he can at least semi deal with them, who isn't going to want that?


Also of course my match history is filled with Sett, I have been asked for him for a decade of league.

> Pick rate doesn't make him need nerfs, that is just stupid.

Pickrate alone doesnt mean he needs nerfs.
High pickrate + High winrate, means he's strong.
The HIGHEST pickrate + the HIGHEST winrate (in game) - means he's too strong.

It's really not that hard of a concept to understand, the more people play a champion, the more people are playing him into bad match ups/play him without fully knowing how to build him or play him - thus lowering his winrate.
If a champion has such and absurd pickrate and absurd winrate - it means he's too strong for how easy he is to play.

> Top lane has been infested with adc for ages and he can at least semi deal with them, who isn't going to want that?

Oh please, this same old scapegoat excuse, give me ONE adc that has a higher pickrate than 2% in toplane, and has a relevent winrate. (spoiler, you cant), [here are some actual stats:](https://u.gg/lol/tier-list/?role=top)
{{champion:67}}  1.7% pickrate, 49% winrate.
{{champion:236}} 1.4% pickrate, 47% winrate. (you have more than 10 times the chance of seeing just {{champion:875}} toplane than you have to see just ONE Lucian player top).
{{champion:133}} 1.8% pickrate, 51% winrate. - Quinn is the only adc who has a positive winrate top, but with her low pickrate, it means she's being played by people who know when to pick her, or how to play her - thats how pickrate matters.

Also, both {{champion:235}} and {{champion:21}}  are getting nerfed in the same patch.

> [{quoted}](name=JackMcCarry,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2020-01-29T21:07:22.276+0000)
>
> Pickrate alone doesnt mean he needs nerfs.
> High pickrate + High winrate, means he's strong.
> The HIGHEST pickrate + the HIGHEST winrate (in game) - means he's too strong.

Again, no. His pick rate just means people like him. His win rate was inflated by a bugg. Nothing special there.
 
> It's really not that hard of a concept to understand, the more people play a champion, the more people are playing him into bad match ups/play him without fully knowing how to build him or play him - thus lowering his winrate.
> If a champion has such and absurd pickrate and absurd winrate - it means he's too strong for how easy he is to play.

No, no it fucking doesn't. It means he is a good counter for what the meta is and the broken champions that have over run this game. The meta with things like crit attack speed Garen are countered by Sett. Garen stomping people with a bullshit build instead of one to keep him alive is of course giving Sett the advantage. Things like Darius's bleed being countered by Sett' W mean Darius doesn't get the free bullshit kills he always does. Sett countering chapions doesn't make him op. 


> Oh please, this same old scapegoat excuse, give me ONE adc that has a higher pickrate than 2% in toplane, and has a relevent winrate. (spoiler, you cant), [here are some actual stats:](https://u.gg/lol/tier-list/?role=top)
> {{champion:67}}  1.7% pickrate, 49% winrate.
> {{champion:236}} 1.4% pickrate, 47% winrate. (you have more than 10 times the chance of seeing just {{champion:875}} toplane than you have to see just ONE Lucian player top).
> {{champion:133}} 1.8% pickrate, 51% winrate. - Quinn is the only adc who has a positive winrate top, but with her low pickrate, it means she's being played by people who know when to pick her, or how to play her - thats how pickrate matters.
> 
> Also, both {{champion:235}} and {{champion:21}}  are getting nerfed in the same patch.

That shit doesn't mean anything. Low win rates are as useful as high win rates, it's all bullshit. Some champions need low win rates to be balanced, while other need higher win rates. Yasuo having a 50% win rate for most is considered broken cause of his skill ceiling. Top adc's are absolutely an issue. All of your win rates and play rate statements are horseshit. Quinn isn't popular and isn't played a lot. That is all that means. Her win rate shows the clear advantage of a ranged champion. 

Also  a minion killing nerf on senna, who is sniping people across the map for free kills, isn't the same as a 4 second nerf on a champions lifeline skill.

> That shit doesn't mean anything. Low win rates are as useful as high win rates, it's all bullshit. Some champions need low win rates to be balanced, while other need higher win rates. Yasuo having a 50% win rate for most is considered broken cause of his skill ceiling. Top adc's are absolutely an issue. All of your win rates and play rate statements are horseshit.

idk man, you are really dense if you dont understand why im using statistics and data and not hyperbolic and baseless statments like you do.

You say ranged champions are a problem and ruining toplane, show how, all ranged champions combined in top are picked less than sett ALONE, how exactly are they running the show top?

> Also a minion killing nerf on senna, who is sniping people across the map for free kills, isn't the same as a 4 second nerf on a champions lifeline skill.

Less souls from killing minions = less damage, less damage = her ult wont snipe as much people because it will have lower damage = her getting less kills from ult snipes means she will have less items = she will be weaker for longer period of the game.

You honestly just seem really ill informed and stuck in your own opinion, i can not do anything more to explanin to you why Sett needs nerfs when you just deflect every data i show you as "HORSE SHIT" and "IT DOESNT MEAN NOTHING HE HAS HIGH PICKRATE CAUSE EVERYONE LOVES HIM".

So, good day, hope you keep playing sett even afte he's nerfed.

EDIT: [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VR87TMUj0cY)
[Watch this video, it will help you get a good mentality on how to play against ranged toplaners](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VR87TMUj0cY).

> [{quoted}](name=JackMcCarry,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-29T22:04:18.175+0000)
>
> idk man, you are really dense if you dont understand why im using statistics and data and not hyperbolic and baseless statments like you do.

I am dense? You are taking statics that don't apply to all champions equally and stating them to me as facts. A low win rate on a high mechanical champion like Yasuo or Vayne is always supposed to be low. a 50% win rate on them would be unbalanced. But a champion who is simple with a 49-51% win rate, though high, like Garen who has a simple kit is balanced. Your statistics mean nothing. Absolutely nothing, They don't equate across all champions and are tainted with popularity and favoritism. Why does Yasuo have a high pick rate even with low win rate at times? Because Yasuo is popular, no matter what win rate. You whole argument is off of flawed data so stop presenting it like there isn't more than balance behind those numbers. Riot even admitted a bug caused inflation on Sett's win rate and here you are still using it as fact.



> You say ranged champions are a problem and ruining toplane, show how, all ranged champions combined in top are picked less than sett ALONE, how exactly are they running the show top?

Of course they are fucking ruining it. It's the only lane a melee champion can survive in and being out poked by long ranged champions cripples top laners. I mean hell if a top laner doesn't get ahead early on, he is useless to the team against any sort of CC, Chain CC, or long range late game.

> Less souls from killing minions = less damage, less damage = her ult wont snipe as much people because it will have lower damage = her getting less kills from ult snipes means she will have less items = she will be weaker for longer period of the game.

Yes, cause her item build alone wasn't broken to begin with, sure.


> You honestly just seem really ill informed and stuck in your own opinion, i can not do anything more to explanin to you why Sett needs nerfs when you just deflect every data i show you as "HORSE SHIT" and "IT DOESNT MEAN NOTHING HE HAS HIGH PICKRATE CAUSE EVERYONE LOVES HIM".
> 
> So, good day, hope you keep playing sett even afte he's nerfed.
> 
> EDIT: [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VR87TMUj0cY)
> [Watch this video, it will help you get a good mentality on how to play against ranged toplaners](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VR87TMUj0cY).

You can't explain anything because your reasoning is flawed and has no merit. Your "data" is circumstantial at best.

Edit: linking a click bait video about some dude doing well in one game isn't explaining anything.

> You can't explain anything because your reasoning is flawed and has no merit. 

I did, you just ignore it or deflect it, im not gonna sit here and type to you how to play every match up step by step because i thought i'd give you more credit than that.

> Your "data" is circumstantial at best.

34,425 game statistic pool isnt circumstantial, but okay, enjoy the nerfs.

> [{quoted}](name=JackMcCarry,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-29T23:36:39.679+0000)

> 
> 34,425 game statistic pool isnt circumstantial, but okay, enjoy the nerfs.

You didn't, you gave me false data telling me nothing other than he is popular and counters a lot of champions.
How about the -5 Movement speed to a certain champ that made no difference at all (*) {{champion:38}}
How is sett getting nerfed before fucking mordekaiser is my question like wtf.
Because all you have to do is give melees (especially bruisers and tanks) in top better base MR and mr per level, like what should have been done a long time ago.

Sett abusers are such a delusional lot. I would say they don't have any thinking capability with the amount of damage they've taken to their heads but I forget, they play Sett so they can just press W or just regen irl.

> [{quoted}](name=Abandon,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2020-01-30T10:10:17.825+0000)

His winrate is pretty crap right about now, sounds like you just got counterpicked hard and are still assblasted over it.

Lol

idk what you guys want to nerf at adcs.
make them meele? thats literally the only thing you can do to make them any worse lol.

obviously shit like kaisa who does more damage with her w+q doesnt count. its not a real adc when she can 1shot you with 2 spells.

> [{quoted}](name=JustA kleo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbqBeEaB,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2020-01-31T04:10:03.229+0000)
>

> make them meele? thats literally the only thing you can do to make them any worse lol.
> 
> obviously shit like kaisa who does more damage with her w+q doesnt count. its not a real adc when she can 1shot you with 2 spells. 

Lower there fucking damage. A champion who no one can reach doing 1000+ damage rat near 2.5 speed is absurd. Give them a little life steal and they melt entire teams. There job is to shot form the back, not duel fighters who are meant to counter them.

Anyone who thinks Kai'sa is even strong... I REALLY hope I see you in my games when you are on the enemy team. How dumb. She has been the worst ADC in the game for solo queue since before worlds across every elo. Can't stand idiots who play it on my team. That is either dodge or lose.

you do know SETT has no losing match up ? 

and its kinda funny for a new champ you have over a 60% win rate on him and that dont surprise you that your win rate is the best on the champ that is clearly broken? 

or is just a coincidence that the champ you are best at just happen to be sett? 

in the last 7 days he still has close to a 58% win rate in plat + with a 19% pick rate and a 58.51% ban rate 

that isnt just cuz of a "bug" because if the bug was that game breaking riot would of disabled him and they havent. 

so a champ that has a combine close to 80% pick ban rate with a 58% win rate isnt over powered?
